SEARCH
Package com.statistics

Class JStatsLib

java.lang.Object
com.statistics.JStatsLib
public class JStatsLib extends Object
JStatsLib provides an interface for importing data and performing statistical operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    JStatsLib(String path, String delimiter)
    Constructs a new JStatsLib instance and loads data from the specified path.

  • Constructor Details

    • JStatsLib

      public JStatsLib(String path, String delimiter)
      Constructs a new JStatsLib instance and loads data from the specified path.
      Parameters:
      path - The file path to load data from
      delimiter - The delimiter used in the file
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the file cannot be read or is empty

      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the file path is invalid

      Calculates the arithmetic mean of the dataset
      Returns:
      The mean value
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if there is no data

    • mode

      public Double mode()
      Finds the mode (most frequent value) in the dataset
      Returns:
      The mode or null if no unique mode exists
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if there is no data

    • invNorm

      public double invNorm(double value, double mean, double stddev)
      Calculates the inverse normal CDF
      Parameters:
      value - The probability value (0-1)
      mean - The mean of the normal distribution
      stddev - The standard deviation of the normal distribution
      Returns:
      The x-value corresponding to the given probability
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if parameters are invalid

    • zInterval

      public double[] zInterval(double cLevel, double mean, double stddev)
      Calculates a z-interval for the dataset
      Parameters:
      cLevel - The confidence level (0-1)
      mean - The mean of the distribution
      stddev - The standard deviation of the distribution
      Returns:
      The confidence interval as a 2-element array
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if parameters are invalid

    • findQuarterPercentiles

      public double[] findQuarterPercentiles()
      Finds the 25th, 50th, and 75th percentiles
      Returns:
      An array containing the quartile values
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if there is insufficient data

    • movingAverage

      Throws:
